quotes: Cricket is not everything, not by any means, but it is a large part of who I am.
author: -MS Dhoni

quotes: You can cut the tension with a cricket stump.
author: -Murray Walker

quotes: No cricket team in the world depends on one or two players. The team always plays to win.
author: -Virat Kohli

quotes: Nothing is easy in cricket. Maybe when you watch it on TV, it looks easy. But it is not. You have to use your brain and time the ball.
author: -Rohit Sharma

quotes: The face of the team are the people who're playing on the cricket field. The team is not about one individual
author: -Gautam Gambhir

quotes: Cricket is basically baseball on valium.
author: -Robin Williams
